title: 2BR/1BA, NO CARPET, 1mile south of Bellevue Square
posting_body: First floor unit next to green belt.
It is quiet and peaceful back here.
Oak cabinets and granite counters in kitchen.
Energy efficient appliances including fridge, dishwasher, range/oven, and washer/dryer combo.
We welcome residents with credit score 650 and above, clear background, positive landlord reference, and income 3 times or more of rent.
Pet less than 25 pounds welcomed with additional refundable pet deposit of $300 per pet, non-refundable pet fee of $300 per pet, and $55 per pet per month pet rent.
Open reserved parking at $75 per space.
Reserved covered parking at $95 per space.
with questions or for showing appointment.
Thank you for reading this ad.
Multi building Property Manager position also available.
